short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of your jobs on any site

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension made for Job seekers wanting to track the progress of their application on different web sites such as LinkedIn, GlassDoor, Indeed. 

Asides from the standard international job search platforms, this plugin also supports the main job search portals specific to Switzerland. 

Also, since 1.6.0, for people in Switzerland required to fill in search efforts with the ORP, the plugins allows to auto-fill the online form.

Finally, to ensure not losing information about tracked job, the extensions allows to download the current state of jobs in a CSV file.

NOTE: This extension is quite young and had only limited testing (for now).
